wikipedia_page.main: Alan Peter Winton (born 4 September 1958) is the Bishop of Thetford in the Church of England Diocese of Norwich.

response: The Bishop of Norwich (Graham Usher)https://www.dioceseofnorwich.org/article?id=4120 leads the diocese and is assisted by two suffragan bishops, the Bishop of Thetford (Alan Winton) and the Bishop of Lynn (Jane Steen). The suffragan sees of Ipswich and of Thetford were both created by the Suffragan Bishops Act 1534 but went into abeyance after one incumbent; Thetford was next filled in 1894 and Ipswich in 1899. The See of Ipswich has been in abeyance since before the diocesan see including that city's name was created; a new second suffragan see – of Lynn – was therefore founded in 1963.
